@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package com.netflix.genie.web.scripts

Package for script loaded at runtime to provide custom extensions and behavior.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClusterSelectorScript
    Implementation of ManagedScript that delegates selection of a job's cluster when more than one choice is available.
    ExecutionModeFilterScript
    Implementation of ManagedScript that delegates selection of a job's execution mode to a script, thus allowing fine-grained blacklisting/whitelisting when it comes to execution mode.
    ManagedScript
    Abstract script class for components that rely on an external script to be loaded and invoked at runtime.
    ManagedScriptBaseProperties
    Base abstract properties for individual script classes to extend.
    ScriptManager
    Utility to load, reload and execute scripts (in whichever format/language supported by ScriptEngine) via URI (e.g., local file, classpath, URL).

Package com.netflix.genie.web.scripts Description

Package for script loaded at runtime to provide custom extensions and behavior.
Since:
4.0.0
